name: Beleth Against the Seven Deadly Sins
name_original: Beleth Against the Seven Deadly Sins
description:
The 7 sins have started a revolution and you must stop them! Follow a little demon under the orders of satan with the mission to stop the 7 sins. Travel through the different worlds , unlock new powers, overcome Sins's tests, confront them and manage to subjugate them!

Defeat the Seven Sins and unveil the mystery behind their rebellion! Will Beleth still support Satan after that? or will she join the other Sins? While progressing in the game Beleth will learn the reasons behind the rebellion. Solve puzzles and defeat enemies, and end up unlocking Sin's favour so you can learn more about them.
